nodes.text: <sniff> Yessss. Thisss isss the one. Thisss isss the human who killed our enemy. Thisss human killed the vile Proach!
Where issss it? Give it to me!
Greetings, great ruler of Dire Rats. I have braved many dangers to speak with you. You are truly amazing to behold!
Yesss... yesss I am.
Sssilensse!

options.text: Cleverly Try to Assess the Situation

nodes.text: O Great Majesty of Vicious Vermin, long have I sought to come before you. I wish to end the conflict between your people and my own.
What is it that you so desire from me?
I slew your enemy... It's dead now. You owe me.

options.text: Defiantly Talk About the Drat Invasion

nodes.text: Yes, I killed your enemy - the giant Proach! Now you had better get your Drats out of the castle before I slay you, too.
You have no idea how powerful I am. Do as I say before you die!
You don't want to see me when I'm angry.
I smell it! I smell it on you! My darling, my power, my prize! Give it back. Give it back to me!
What are you talking about?
My magical Amulet! The vile Proach stole it from me. The Proach grew powerful from MY magic!
Return to me when you have found my amulet. My beautiful broach. My powerful pretty.
Now Begone!

nodes.name: The Drat Queen's Amulet
nodes.description: If I want to get rid of the Drat Queen, then I'll have to find her amulet. She says that a Proach has it. That shouldn't be a problem, should it?

nodes.text: I smell it! I smell it on you! My darling, my power, my prize! Give it back. Give it back to me!
What are you talking about?
My magical Amulet! The vile Proach stole it from me. The Proach grew powerful from MY magic!
You have invaded my kingdom. Now you will die!
Unlessssss...
I can be very helpful... what can I do for you?
You mussst kill our enemy. You musssst kill the Proach that sssstole my amulet! When you give me the amulet, then I will ssspare your life.
Let me get this straight... you want me to kill a Proach?
You will kill the foul Proach that hasss my amulet! I mussst have my amulet back!
Oh, sure. No problem... I'll get you your amulet back in no time.
Do SSSo! Go!

nodes.name: The Drat Queen's Amulet
nodes.description: If I want to get rid of the Drat Queen, then I'll have to find her amulet. She says that a Proach has it. That shouldn't be a problem, should it?

nodes.message: Invoked whether or not the Giant Proach is dead.

nodes.text: Is this what you are talking about?
Yes! Give it to me! Give it now!
Here you are... Now will you make the Drats stay out of the school?
My Amulet! Yes! It is mine once more...
And now, human... you will die!
Wait... what? You got want you needed. If you try to kill me, you'll only make enemies of everyone in the school. Do you think I'm the only one who knows where you live?
They'll all come after you with swords and magic and bombs! They'll blow you and all your people out of the dungeon. You'd better escape while you still can.
Oh very well then. Leave here and never come back! We shall find another home where no human will disturb us again.
Now... Go!
I'll be happy to give you the amulet...
If you first agree to leave this castle with all your people once you have it back.
I will kill you and let my children feast upon you!
I killed your Drats and the Giant Proach - remember? I will kill you AND all your children unless you leave this place forever.
I killed your Drats and snuck past the Giant Proach - remember? I will kill you AND all your children unless you leave this place forever.
So what is it going to be - make a deal... or die?
(Hiss) Very well - give me my Amulet and we Dire Rats shall leave this accursed place forever!
Fine, but if you ever go back on your word, I'll know where to find you.
My Amulet! My lovely Amulet!
Now... Go!

options.text: Refuse to Give Up the Amulet

nodes.text: I killed the Giant Proach that terrorized your dumb Drats. Now your Drats are running around the castle making trouble. I'm not about to give you something to make you more powerful. The amulet is mine, now.
Your Drats are running around the castle attacking everyone. You are just a big fat bully. There is no way I am going to give you a magical amulet.
Then I sssshhall take the amulet from your corpsssse!
I don't have the amulet right now...
Then you will die!

nodes.name: The Drat Queen's Amulet
nodes.description: If I want to get rid of the Drat Queen, then I'll have to find her amulet. I'm not sure that giving a powerful magic item to an evil giant Drat is a really good idea...

nodes.text: Wait! I know where it is. I'll go get it and bring it to you. You won't need to have your Dire Rats hunt for it - that might take a while. Don't worry - you'll have your amulet back soon!
Very well, I will sssspare your missserable life. Return with my amulet ssssoon. Now go!
Your Drats are running around the castle attacking everyone. You are just a big fat bully. There is no way I am going to give you a magical amulet.
Then I sssshhall take the amulet from your corpsssse!
